1680950.name: RPG Maker MZ - Minikle's Background CG Material Collection "Dungeon" part01 A
1680950.description:
About this content

A variety of single-picture dungeon materials suitable for RPGs.
Time differences are also included for day, evening, night, and night (with lights, if available).
Please make use of them for your adventure game production.

*******************************************
Including pictures：78 materials x 2 sizes（816 pixels×624 pixels、1280 pixels x 720 pixels）
*******************************************

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series ONLY
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
・All copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.
